name: Block Tower (HD)
description:
Block Tower - Stack ‘em high! An arcade classic!

The objective is simple; stack the block tower as high as possible.

Tap the stop button to stop the moving blocks. The higher the tower, the faster the blocks. The faster you stack, the higher your score.

Timing is everything!

Features:
* Easy to learn game mechanics; tap to play!
* Addictive fun for everyone
* Trophies and high scores
